name: Digging Mandrill
description:
Digging Mandrill is a fun and addictive arcade game where you play as a mischievous monkey on a mission to uncover hidden treasures deep beneath an African Tree called Baobá. With your trusty hands, you must dig through dirt and rocks, avoid obstacles, and collect valuable resources such as Baobá Leaf's to help your journey. The deeper you dig, the more challenging the terrain becomes, so you must be quick and agile to reach the bottom and discover the riches that await. With intuitive controls and cute, cartoon graphics, Digging Monkey is the perfect game for anyone looking for a lighthearted and entertaining adventure. So go help the monkey and start digging today!

3GLA Team:

Guilherme De Cicco - Game Designer and Level Designer

Anny Caroline Sousa - Lead Programmer

Gabriel de Souza - Programmer

Luan Moura - Composer and Sound Designer

Gabriel Lopes - 2D Artist
